alert.note: Alert for Cattaraugus; Chautauqua; Northern Erie; Southern Erie; Wyoming (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued November 16 at 5:31PM EST by NWS Buffalo
info.description: ...A BAND OF LAKE EFFECT SNOW WILL AFFECT PARTS OF CHAUTAUQUA... CATTARAUGUS...SOUTHERN ERIE...WYOMING...AND NORTHERN ERIE COUNTIES... HAZARDS...A band of lake effect snow will continue to impact the Lake Erie shore from Ripley to Hamburg and then inland across the Chautauqua Ridge, Boston Hills into western Wyoming County through early evening. The snow may continue to mix with some rain at lower elevations and close to Lake Erie, but is now starting to changeover to wet snow across some the lower areas. Accumulations of a couple inches are expected through early evening across higher terrain and beneath the strongest portion of the band. A slushy inch will be possible across lower elevations. Roads will be slushy and very slippery at times. LOCATIONS IMPACTED INCLUDE... Dunkirk, Fredonia, Hamburg, East Aurora, Evans, Boston, Eden, Springville, Warsaw, Bennington, Colden, Orchard Park, Westfield, Gowanda, Silver Creek, Blasdell, Angola, Arcade, Mayville and North Collins. This includes Interstate 90 between exits 56 and 61. SAFETY INFO... Conditions can deteriorate rapidly in winter weather situations. Be prepared for snow or ice covered roads. Slow down and allow extra time to reach your destination. &&
